task.en: Help me modify keyboard settings, toggling the key repeat rate to the fastest possible.
task.zh: 帮我更改键盘设置，将键重复速率拖动到最快。
task.ar: ساعدني في تعديل إعدادات لوحة المفاتيح وضبط معدل تكرار المفاتيح على أسرع قيمة ممكنة.
task.ja: キーボード設定を変更し、キー繰り返し速度を可能な限り速くしてください。
task.ru: Измените настройки клавиатуры, установив максимальную скорость повторения клавиши.

pre_command: osascript -e 'tell app "System Settings" to quit' && defaults delete -g KeyRepeat
grading_command: defaults read -g KeyRepeat 2>/dev/null | grep -q "2" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "Keyboard" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "键盘" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "لوحة المفاتيح" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "キーボード" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "Клавиатура" && echo "True" || echo "False"
osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get name of first process whose frontmost is true' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "System Settings" && echo "True" || echo "False"
